metadata.name: Potential Data Exfiltration Activity Via CommandLine Tools
metadata.comment: Detects the use of various CLI utilities exfiltrating data via web requests

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND ((endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\pwsh.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\cmd.exe'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('invoke-webrequest')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('iwr ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('wget ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('curl '))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -ur')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -me')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -b')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' post ')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\curl.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--ur')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -d ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' --data '))) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\wget.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--post-data')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--post-file')))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('get-content')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('getbytes')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hostname')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ifconfig')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ipconfig')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('net view')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('netstat')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('nltest')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('qprocess')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sc query')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('systeminfo')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('tasklist')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('tobase64string')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('whoami'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('type ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' > ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' c:\\')))

output.summary: Detects the use of various CLI utilities exfiltrating data via web requests
